org.forgerock.cuppa.model

Class Option<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.cuppa.model.Option<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the value stored within this Option.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TagsOption

    public abstract class Option<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An option stores a value of the given type. Options allow Cuppa's data model to be extended to include additional metadata about tests and test blocks.

    To create a Option, you should create a unique subclass for your data. This allows you to avoid colliding with other extensions.

    Options are immutable. Subclasses should make defensive copies of any mutable data structures passed to them.

    See Also:
    Options, TagsOption
